name: Mycelium OGs
description: This token transition NFT commemorates the early adopters and OG members of the Tracer DAO X Mycelium ecosystem. Tracer DAO built permissionless and decentralised derivative infrastructure, with no margins and no liquidations, represented by the $TCR token. This NFT belongs to those who believed in $TCRâ€™s core mission to make financial markets more accessible from day one, and have supported our evolution to Mycelium, $MYC: a larger network committed to realizing that vision. Mycelium OG NFTs are minted to OG TCR holders to commemorate their early adoption of our trading platform and community.
